metadata.title: CVE-2022-20141 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In ip_check_mc_rcu of igmp.c, there is a possible use after free due toimproper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege whenopening and closing inet sockets with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-112551163References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
